website_summaries.verdict: Fast, reliable, and durable laser printing with plenty of office-friendly features.
pros: Fast printing, starting up in under 6 sec
Extremely reliable printing with few to no glitches

customer_reviews.title: One of the best MFC machines for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Brother printers for about 20 years. They have run better and lasted longer than other bands I've tried. I run a tax business and we have about 8 printers that are running all day, 6 days a week. This one is also our fax machine. I only buy Brother all-in-one multi-function machines at this point. They scan, fax, copy without a problem. Scan in Color, gray scale, or B/W. You can copy from the flat bed or through the auto feed. We print our envelopes and own letterhead. Of course I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Master Horne

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Printer is great. However, had problem with the toner cartridge leaking when the machine arrived. Spent aproximately 1 hour with customer service (30 minutes hold and 30 minutes trouble shooting. Customer service refused to back the product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Functional but no dual-sided scanning
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for its features and production. I read specs as if multi-page scanning was for each side. I was wrong. I was surprised of the inconvenience that it didn't have this function. I am an insurance agent with a small office. This definitely slows down my productivity. If you don't need this type of scanning feature, then this is the perfect printer for you.
customer_reviews.author: ereyes

customer_reviews.title: Newer is not sometimes better!
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Laser Printer HL-5470DW that is a work horse. The laser fuser went out on it after 2.5 years of major printing. I decided to invest in the MFC-L5700DW laser printer..it is not quite the work horse that the other one is. Has all the other features scan, copy, fax, etc. It paper jams frequently where the 5470 rarely jammed. The dual trays are not compatible with each other so they have to be bought separately. Toner is expensive on both, the the newest one is even more so expensive, wish I would have just replaced on the old one the laser fuser which runs around 150. Or just found that model for sale somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Very Responsive WiFi
customer_reviews.text: First the good. This large all-in-one unit prints quickly, even with batch feeds. Furthermore, the WiFi is very dependable. My laptop is on the first floor and my printer as far away as possible on the second floor. However, the WiFi has functioned perfectly. Second, setting the printer up was a major task. The instructions provided little help and I called Customer Service. The service rep was excellent and very-I stress "very" here, patient. It took about 1/2 hour with the service rep to get the printer fully functional. My suggestion for Brother is to provide better instructions as the set-up was far more technical than the set-up manual indicated. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Pizza

customer_reviews.title: Printer Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I print many documents daily a a Mobile Signing Agent. This printer is fast, reliable, and durable for all task at hand. I will look to purchase an additional printer to have as standby unit to compliment this amazing workhorse. I purchased brand new in 2018 and I am providing and catching up with all reviews from this point
customer_reviews.author: Photos Now Unlimited

customer_reviews.title: Great printer! Easy setup and ready to go in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great printer! Easy setup and ready to go in no time. Bought this for my dept at work and is a perfect size to share with about 10 people. Used the online driver setup and have had no problems so far. we are not using the wifi feature at this time so can't comment on that. It prints super fast and easily handles the loads of printing we do. A big selling point was the built in USB port at the front so we can scan docs to a flash drive right from the unit. Good all in one without the bulk of some other models. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Flavorgirl

customer_reviews.title: Scanning copying are great! I will say that scanning multiple pages leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: The print quality is top notch! The set up went well using wireless, but I did have to reset my router before the settings took effect, this was probably something on my end. Scanning copying are great! I will say that scanning multiple pages leaves some of the scanned pdf's a little off center, there may be a way to calibrate it, for my purposes it have not been a big deal. Highly recommended for a small business or having to work from home like me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Better than previous models few years back
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth, elegant and agile. For $270.00 super value for a 42pg/min beast. Has Much better drivers for PCs and Apple Smartphones than 6 year earlier version that after 22,000 pages and many years began to jam on multiple page prints (single pages and all other functions still ok). cheaper to buy this newer version that came with a 2k page toner and new everything including warranty. Took the old one home which works still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, good for a shared office
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup (but a very heavy box to carry upstairs). Once firmware was updated it works perfectly. Good for our shared office. Fast, hold lots of paper, easy to scan and copy too.
customer_reviews.author: pilotSteve

customer_reviews.title: A Strong Workhorse Commercial Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is what our I.T. department recommends for all of our 11 locations. They're perfectly equipped to handle the workload of a small office. Our office prints almost non-stop and the toner lasts for a long time. The older models we had before these ones lasted for 10 years so I estimate that this new model will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryder Reviews

customer_reviews.title: This unit is amazing. I had it out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This unit is amazing. I had it out of the box, and connected to my network (and printing) in under an hour. I then printed from 2 iPhones, 2 iPads, and scanned in a document in another 30 minutes. I can't believe how seamless this went. Kudos to Brother for an extremely easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but pages start wrinkling after a while
customer_reviews.text: Our small business used this printer and it held its own for a while. It is a solid machine that does everything well, but is pretty expensive. After roughly a year (and after the warranty had conveniently expired), every page that came out of the printer was wrinkled. Some pages were worse than others, but all had some sort of wrinkle. Brothers response was that since it was out of warranty, we would have to take it to an authorized Brother repair shop and the closest was several town away. So instead of traveling with the printer and having to pay to get it fixed, we bought a new HP printer and are happier with that
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't perform as promised - don't buy this if you need a simple 3 way
customer_reviews.text: Cant fax or scan easily. Customer service was unable to help (was on the phone with them for over an hour yesterday) Today no one answers.Wanted a fax/scanner that would be easy to use.....sorry I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Capperroma

customer_reviews.title: Too high
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer but was under the impression that it came with color. When i found out how much the color was on this thing i choked. Paying almost the same price for one color other than black. That's ridiculous. Other than that I'm happy with the work that it does though the price is high.
customer_reviews.author: shawana sienko

customer_reviews.title: Does not function properly
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get the printer to be registered it says the serial number is not accurate. I can’t get the printer to print continuously it gets stuck on receiving data mode and I have to keep restarting it so far it’s been completely worthless
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Lane

customer_reviews.title: Feeds duplicate paper
customer_reviews.text: This printer is not reliable. It will feed checks through two and three at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product performance
customer_reviews.text: This Brother printer was not a good investment for me. It was slow to dire up when a print command was given & often when it started to print, it would completely shut down the Dell computer. I had never experienced that problem with the HP (which had simply worn out after years of use) that we purchased the Brother to replace. I had to return the Brother after many attempts to get it to work without it shutting down my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... one that this printer replaced worked for 4 years pretty heavy work load
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Brother printers - the one that this printer replaced worked for 4 years pretty heavy work load. Just gave up last week. This printer was easy to set up - was printing and scanning right away. My only issue so far - it is louder than the old one. The first time it started printing, it scared me. Not sure why it is so loud.
customer_reviews.author: Racheli

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from previous generation MFC
customer_reviews.text: Well updated unit compared to the previous generation Brother MFC that discontinued Dec 2015. One issue I have it the number keys although sleekly hidden when lit up is a little inaccurate or not sure if pressed. Need haptic feedback like the mobile phones. Also, wish it has the super yield toner capacity and 500 pg paper tray.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Big Brother fan, but
customer_reviews.text: This all in one printer works well, until I moved it to my new condo. Than the printed pages started getting like a parchment look, little blotches of ink on them. It still works well, especially like the scanner. This may be that the cartridge got shook up during move. Hope a new cartridge works better
customer_reviews.author: Bill of Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Worst Brother Printer Owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned four other Brother Laser printers and they were all terrific. Clear copies, great scan and sharp prints. This machine is not in the same ball park. It is slow, the first few copies each day have a black haze to them and it loses contact with the WIFI network. I can't wait to send it to its maker.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Loory

customer_reviews.title: Decent printer.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised on the print quality and the overall quality of printer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! I upgraded from the mfc7840w and this machine is way faster start up, printing and scanning. If you are looking for a professional type machine at a great price, then I highly recommend this. The only problem I have with it is I mistakenly thought it did double sided prints automatically, and it does not, only manually.
customer_reviews.author: Young's

customer_reviews.title: junk- died after 3 yrs, Brother is no help
customer_reviews.text: Just stoped working all the sudden, got to white back lit start screen with blue brother logo, machine won't boot further. While polite, tech support was not help and said I must take it to an outside business machine repair shop. Frustrating. Why make products that will break in 3 years and end up in a landfill?
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Another good Brother product
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and install. It is a little taller than we expected, but we were able to move a shelf in the book case. Prints great and the scanner function works fine. The unit is noisy when printing.
customer_reviews.author: Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: Wireless connectivity is abysmall
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer now for over a year and have never been able to get it to connect to our wifi network. Garbage, garbage, garbage. Buy something else unless you are a computer technician or don't need the wifi connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ravenscroft

customer_reviews.title: Best printer for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best printer I have ever owned and the wireless setup was so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: This is the Printer You're Looking For
customer_reviews.text: If you want something good on toner, that does quality printing, and is fast then this is the printer for you as long as you don't need color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this machine so far. It was easy to set up and shipment was quick and I was continuously updated about it’s arrival time. I use it with Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Needed a new drum replacement after 6 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product because it is faulty. I got a replace drum error after 6 weeks of use in a small office. The toner cartridge is not cheap either. This product will cost you a fortune to run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it work wirelessly from iOS 10.13 & 10.14
customer_reviews.text: Tried downloading the drivers and Software from Brother's website. Could not get it Wireless printing to work from Mac 10.13 and 10.14. Works fine from Windows 10, but I am sending it back because I need it for Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Moya

customer_reviews.title: Best printer I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've use this at home for about 4 months and am quite pleased with it. No problems so far. It's fast (both startup and printing), copies are good, and it's easy to operate after a little experience.
customer_reviews.author: jmh6

customer_reviews.title: Great job Brother Great job
customer_reviews.text: Much more then what you paid for it!... 10 STARS. we are IT Contractors, this printer put HP, Lexmark and others brand behind it. Great job Brother Great job... it does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: CSANS Tech

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If I could have just one piece of office equipment, this would be it. Easy to set up, easy to use, and super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Weisgerber LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It's probably more printer than we need, but it does a great job. After two days trying to set it up ourselves, we called Brother support and they were terrific. Occasionally there are a couple small marks on the printed page but for our purposes it's fine. The copy and scan features work well. We didn't hook up the fax capability.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S. from Inger MN

customer_reviews.title: Expectations fulfiilled
customer_reviews.text: Works as good or better than my old Brother 8480. Lets hope the fuser lasts a bit longer. Makes me wish the engineers and designs would make these things with the fuser as replaceable as the toner. Just a thought.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Wagamon

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks. Only issue I have is the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. Only issue I have is the house lights dimming when it keys up.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Hess

customer_reviews.title: ... this a week in my office and it's been great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had used this a week in my office and it's been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: for printing quality ease of use this is the best printer i ever have
customer_reviews.author: s  lee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love my printer. Easy to use. A real workhorse. Never an issue. Use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Schwed

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer/Copier
customer_reviews.text: If you only need B & W printing (like we do for our business) this one is a great one. The ink/toner is relatively cheap and easy to replace and the printing is very fast.
customer_reviews.author: uptheorg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product to have. I works great. All functions of the printer work very good. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer for every day use. It doesn't require constant refills of ink cartridges like our previous printer...Whew!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great office scanner
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this office scanner for 6 months or so. We haven't encountered any issues. This was a great purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay for the printer and the available functions, you can't really beat it! A+
customer_reviews.author: KFE Brake Systems

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has worked flawlessly so far. It has been 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: YouTube - Bear's Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Not the best!
customer_reviews.text: Broke down in less than a year!! The warranty never got redeemed because company doesnot take responsibility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, very easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great printer, very easy setup. Sends PDFs to connected computers - no setup required at all ... no need to configure scan to email. It just works.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This all in one does everything except make you a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: ipka54

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just bad luck as my first brother printer overheated
customer_reviews.text: It keeps enlarging print on it's own. Maybe just bad luck as my first brother printer overheated.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Collins

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Economical Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is awesome. It is very fast, prints for the office very well, makes great copies and scans. It prints in black and white, which is exactly what I wanted. I could not ask for a better printer that three of us use in my office.
customer_reviews.author: William Brightwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Shipping was fast! Easy to set up and to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and
customer_reviews.text: Fast printing, clear printing, easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Terry Pawelko

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED, TONER SMUDGES ON PRINTED PAPERS
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED, TONER SMUDGES ON PRINTED PAPERS, I HAVE CLEANED IT ONLY FIXES FOR SHORT TIME. WENT BACK TO BROTHER TONER CARTRIDGES DIDNT HELP. TOO MUCH MONEY FOR SUCH POOR PERFORMANCE.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Deservers it's CR high rating
customer_reviews.text: Did not need any tech support. Copier/scanner/printer all work well and extremely fast. Overall. very pleased and would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This is the wrong printer I have ever bought. I have waiting too late to return it, so not buy!! Customer service is poor and printer is unreliable
customer_reviews.author: Lynell Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Product quality
customer_reviews.text: we received this product we have not had it for all but 3 months. and the top cover hinge is broken on one side the the display does not function properly and we cannot fax from it, I would not recommend purchasing from this company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does not print true to pdf and I got two trays
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Prints fast and clear. Set up was easy. :)
customer_reviews.author: TMRennie

customer_reviews.title: I've been extremely happy with this printer
customer_reviews.text: I've been extremely happy with this printer. Excellent print quality. Easy to use. It's a little bigger than I was expecting, but in all, a great choice for home/small office.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit for printing
customer_reviews.text: The right printer for our Young Adults department. -Jesus Baptist Las Vegas
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Baptist Las Vegas Church

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do ... with some effort.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but the user interface for scan/fax is lacking. It's overly complicated and missing some key features. For instance, for fax options you can only send image file, or scan something straight to fax. It won't let you pick any other file type (like pdf or doc). Adobe does work the scanner from inside the adobe user controls either. Quality is good, remote fax is good
customer_reviews.author: Rick Owens

customer_reviews.title: ... the toner cartridge inserted improperly rendering the entire printer useless. I have tried calling Amazon using the service ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered with the toner cartridge inserted improperly rendering the entire printer useless. I have tried calling Amazon using the service number but it keeps hanging up after 30 seconds. I cannot believe that I wasted 300 bucks on this
customer_reviews.author: Customer customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Phone Support
customer_reviews.text: Brother support has gone to the dogs. If you have a superficial problem you might get minimal help. The installation of this machine on our network went terrific, much easier than prior purchases of Brother. We ran into the problem on a firmware update which many machines will need. When we contacted Brother support two separate times we waited on hold 20 plus minutes each time. When we finally got support we got ATTITUDE and inept assistance. Brother needs to perform quality control on their support staff. After wasting time with the support effort, we gutted it out and spent another few hours doing the work support failed to. Complete with firmware update the installation took 7 hours.
customer_reviews.author: PWR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine; it's fast and compact. My only issue is that it doesn't accommodate legal size on the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great all in one. Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn G. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't copy a 2 sided page but overall its very nice
customer_reviews.author: Heritage Place Apartments

customer_reviews.title: This printer is bad. It puts a huge crease down the middle ...
customer_reviews.text: This printer is bad. It puts a huge crease down the middle of the sheet. I had a similar brother model that also did the crease. Brother replaced it with a refurbished one that started doing the crease thing days after the warranty expired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get it to show up on the home WiFi. I’ve read the very limited directions. And I’ve done this with a dozen other printers over the years ... including other Brother models. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Robinson

customer_reviews.title: so good -- does everything we want it to do
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good -- does everything we want it to do. We will see how it lasts -- hope it lasts as long as our last Brother printer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very nice and fast!! works with every device that can print so far, droids, apples, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: not used much yet, kinda noisy, but prints ok, easy to connect, scan works way better than I used to ( canon mfc )
customer_reviews.author: I.K.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: great printer but the toner it came with maybe printed 20 pages than ran out? come on
customer_reviews.author: Bordy

customer_reviews.title: This model is not as simple as the MFC 8950DW ...
customer_reviews.text: This model is not as simple as the MFC 8950DW...TOO MANY STEPS SCANNING TO E-MAIL AND VERY LIMITED IN SETTING UP THE QUIK DIAL LIST FOR E-MAILS.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: great printer
customer_reviews.text: very easy to load paper and lots of space for paper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good we love it here at the office.
customer_reviews.author: ZAHIRA TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Working well, clean fast copies. Only problem so ...
customer_reviews.text: Working well, clean fast copies. Only problem so far is that the fax memory fills up fast and machine stops working. For some reason all incoming faxes get stored in memory, even though they printed normally. Each fax in the memory (50) has to be manually cleared. I will try to read the manual and see if there is any way around it. When in doubt, RTFM!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Larry B

customer_reviews.title: A Work Horse!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Brother printers for years. They are priced right and very dependable. Bought this for the faster speed months ago. It's a real work horse and I recommend it. Scans good and prints fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down easily, also malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: Breaks down easily, also malfunctions...had 4 replacements already! Horrible customer service to deal with at Brother as well...Never buy brother products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: So far, this printer has exceeded our expectations. And... it was cheaper than at Office Depot.
customer_reviews.author: The Coleys

product_meta.title: Brother Monochrome Laser Multifunction All-in-One Printer, MFC-L5700DW, Flexible Network Connectivity, Mobile Printing & Scanning, Duplex Printing, Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready, Black
product_meta.description: Brother All-in-One Laser Printer MFC-L5700DW was engineered to help enhance your workflow’s productivity with a print and copy speed of up to 42 pages per minute. (2) This high-performance all-in-one produces professional spreadsheets, reports, correspondence, and other important business documents with crisp graphics and text. Plus, this small office printer, copier, scanner, and fax machine offers simultaneous operation (for example, printing and scanning at the same time) so that multiple workgroup members can use the machine at once without experiencing slow-downs. A 3. 7” touchscreen makes menu navigation easy and permits you to create up to 48 customized shortcuts. The MFC-L5700DW offers flexible connectivity through a built-in wireless 802. 11b/g/n and Ethernet interface that allows multiple users to safely and securely submit tasks. Plus, scan to popular business cloud services directly from the touchscreen, including Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneNote, and more. (3) Users can also connect to the Brother Laser All-in-One through their mobile devices via popular mobile apps such as Brother’s free iPrint&Scan app, Cortado Workplace, AirPrint, Google Cloud Print 2. 0, and Wi-Fi Direct. (1, 3) For those with USB flash memory drives, printing is simple thanks to a built-in USB host located on the front of the machine. This business all-in-one is great for small to medium businesses that require flexible paper handling. The adjustable 250-sheet capacity paper tray and 50-sheet multipurpose tray make printing and copying simple. Users can upgrade all the way to 1, 340-sheet total capacity with optional trays (LT-5500, LT-6500). The Business Laser All-in-One is also very secure, utilizing Active Directory, Secure Function Lock, SSL Security, and more. Brother offers a 1-year limited and phone support for the lifes of your product. The MFC-L5700DW is also Dash Replenishment enabled. This system allows the printer to measure the toner level of your Genuine Brother Replacement Cartridges and automatically order replacements. This ensures you never run out of toner so that you can maintain the office efficiency you expect and require. (1)Requires connection to a wireless network. (2)Based on one-sided printing. Change from default setting required. (3)Requires an Internet connection and an account with desired service. (4)Approximate toner cartridge yield in accordance with ISO/IEC 19752 (letter/A4).
feature_bullets: Flexible network connectivity: Built-in wireless 802.11b/g/n and Ethernet interfaces allow you to share the MFCL57000DW with multiple users

3.7” Touchscreen: A touchscreen allows easy menu navigation and the creation of upto 48-customized shortcuts for quicker copying projects. Black and white only. Mobile Device Compatibility - AirPrint, Google Cloud Print 2.0, Brother iPrint&Scan, Mopria, Cortado Workplace, Wi-Fi Direct
Mobile printing & scanning: The Brother MFCL5700DW allows you to connect via wireless devices and submit scanning and printing jobs remotely (1)
Amazon dash replenishment enabled: Upon activation, Amazon Dash Replenishment measures the toner level and orders more from Amazon when it’s low

For use with brother genuine toners: TN820 standard yield toner, TN850 high yield toner for cost efficient printing. Standard paper input capacity 250 sheets. Multi-purpose tray capacity 50 sheets. Optional paper capacity 250 sheets x2 with LT-5500 tray, or 520 sheets x2 with LT-6500 tray. Output paper capacity 150 sheets. Automatic document feeder capacity max. 50 pages

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars304 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
